DOC.brief_title: Supplementation With Nutrients Modulating IGF-1 Cytokines Elderly People Risk Undernutrition
DOC.detailed_description: Sixty age 65 year , live independently community elderly people , nondiabetic subject serum prealbumin 30 mg/dL BMI 25 kg/m2 recruit . The subject follow 2-week pre-intervention period , follow intervention period , receive 2 carton liquid oral nutritional supplementation daily 2 week .
